FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Well, sometimes we're trying to keep our heads above the water, other times we're trying to drown ourselves in it.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~有时我们想让自己探出水面，~n~有时也会想把自己浸在水下。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Fuck, I practically had to come outta the womb swinging.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~操，刚从子宫里出来我就必须要打架了。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~After all that there ain't a chance in hell of me being able to get hard. It's a fucking Catch-22.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~到头来，我他妈根本就硬不起来。这他妈是个死循环。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~You're getting to know the McReary family pretty good, Niko boy. What's left of it at least.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~你现在很了解McReary家族了，Niko仔。至少了解剩下的部分。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Sneaky fucking bastard he was, even back then.
~z~Cocaine is a realist's drug, right? Keeps you in the moment.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~可卡因是现实主义者的毒品，对吧？让你活在当下。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Ma had walked out when it started, didn't want to nothing to do with it.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我妈在这一架开始的时候就出去了，完全不想管。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Like he'd been rolling around the floor of an abattoir.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~就像刚在屠宰场打过滚一样。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Niko boy, how's it going? What's happening with you?
~z~As the youngest I was always getting me ass kicked. By Derrick, by Gerald...
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~作为最小的弟弟，我经常被打。被Derrick打，被Gerald打...

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Must have killed someone, I guess. I never found out.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我猜是刚杀完人，但没法求证。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~but at least you ain't a fucking hypocrite?
~z~Maybe we're all hypocrites. All imbeciles. Francis - you know about Francis - he wanted to be a priest.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~也许我们都是伪君子。都是蠢蛋。Francis－你也了解他－他曾想成为神父。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~The fighting bit mainly - drunken fights, sober fights, fights on the subway, fights with the family.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我的话以打斗为主，醉了打斗、醒着打斗、在地铁上打斗、和家人打斗。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~They both just stopped when they saw her. Kate stopped being a kid after that. You know what I mean?
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~看见她就停下来了。自那以后Kate就不再是一个小孩子了。懂我意思吗？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~He got thrown out of the seminary, for cheating. He tried to cheat God.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~他因为作弊被神学院赶出来了。他居然想欺骗上帝。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~When Gerry first went to juvie, she kept laying a place at the table for him.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~Gerry头一次进少管所的时候，她也在桌上给他留了位置。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Wasn't hard for me, but I always knew what life was like.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~对我倒不艰难，但我向来知道生活是怎样的。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~There ain't winner in a fight like this. I thought the only thing that was gonna end it was one of them dying.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~这种干架没有赢家。我觉得只有打到一个人半死不活才会结束。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Did your family fight a lot growing up?
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~你们家里人小时候经常打架吗？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Thanks, I think. I always liked Gerry.
~z~I dunno, she's me ma but I ain't gonna ever understand that.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我也不知道，虽然是我妈，但我一辈子都搞不懂她。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~No. well, it must have been hard, realizing your brothers kill people.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~不一样了。肯定很艰难，意识到你的兄弟都是杀人魔。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Because Derrick was a grass. In England.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~因为Derrick是个告密者，在英国的时候。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~If an Irishman ain't beating himself up he's beating up his family.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~要是一个爱尔兰人不打他自己，他就会打自己的家人。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Bury your brother, bury your dad, but at least you can look in the mirror and feel okay?
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~埋葬你的兄弟，埋葬你的父亲，但这样你就能安心地看着镜子里的自己？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Not really, usual series of shootouts, fist fights and robberies.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~没什么新的，还是枪击、肉搏和抢劫之类的。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Well not much, you know... problems, solutions, usual sort of thing.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~没怎么，你也知道...问题、解决，还是老样子。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~a weird combination of crazy maniac and thoughtful controlled guy.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~疯子神经病与冷静思想家的怪异结合体。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~There was just this feeling in the air. This feeling that told me - this one ain't like all the other fights. They didn't stop.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~空气里就有一种氛围。这个氛围告诉我，这一次不同于往常的打架。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~He was involved in that business and he grassed on some people to avoid doing some serious time.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~和黑社会有关，他为了不坐牢就告发了别人。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Yeah. Yeah, Kate saw the whole scene, him, insane like he'd ripped a man's throat out,
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~是。是，Kate全都看见了，他疯狂到像是刚割了谁的喉一样。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~When Pa would get drunk and do things. She'd just glaze over.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~一旦爸喝醉了开始发疯，她就会一脸茫然。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~One time I remember Frankie and Gerald going at it.
~z~You sounded just like Gerry when you said that, all cagey and thoughtful, like I might be wearing a wire.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~你这么说话就很像Gerry，深沉晦涩，搞得跟我在窃听一样。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~All of us apart from Derrick that is. He left us to visit the Old Country.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~只有Derrick是个例外。他之前离开我们回老家了。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Shit, that sounds like a fucking extract from my diary. It would if I kept a diary at least.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我靠，你他妈从我日记里抄的吧，如果我有写日记的话。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~blood everywhere, the showering, the burning of clothes...
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~浑身是血，洗了个澡，烧掉衣服...

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~I guess we got Ma to thank for that. Taking us to church and cooking a big lunch for the family on a Sunday.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~这点多亏了妈。礼拜日都会带我们去教堂，还会做丰盛的午餐。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~No. He spun it different, but that was the truth.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~不，他的说法可能不同，但我说的是事实。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Packie, how's it going man? Is good to see you.
~z~You feel that way, you ever feel that need to obliterate yourself?
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~你有这种感觉吗？是不是还想过要毁灭自己？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~I don't think you're wearing a wire. My English can be a bit bad.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我不觉得你在窃听。可能是我英语不太好。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~I knew you could understand that grief.
~z~That's what I thought at first, now I just reckon it was denial. She's got this power to switch off.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~一开始我也是这么想的，现在我觉得不是这样。她是有装聋不听的本事的。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Can you believe it? So he became a fucking cop.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~你敢信？然后他他妈就成了条子。
~z~这一架是怎么结束的，谁赢了？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~The world has a strange way of knocking that out of you pretty quick, hey?
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~世界真是奇怪，总能在这种事上给你当头一棒，嘿？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Good to see you Niko, anything new going on?
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~很高兴见到你，Niko，有什么新鲜事吗？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Pain comes easy to the McReary's. Pain and remorse and doing whatever we can to forget about them.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~痛苦很容易找上McReary家。悲痛、自责，然后尽己所能，把这些忘个精光。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~And he had this weird look in his eyes, like he was possessed.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~然后他的神情就很奇怪，像是恶灵附身了一样。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~He messed the whole fucking family up, I reckon. I used to think I loved him, then I realized I hated him.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~他他妈把整个家都搞烂了。曾经我觉得我爱他，后来发现其实是恨他。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Life knocks most things out of you pretty quick.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~生活在大多数事情上都会给你当头一棒。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~That was until my pa got into a drunken rage one week and threw Gerry's plate against the wall.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~直到有一周我爸发酒疯，抄起Gerry的盘子就往墙上砸。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~he was a good friend of Roman's too. We never speak about it.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~他跟Roman也是好朋友。我们从来不提这件事。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~More than anything he loved a good ruck though.
~z~With me, it's myself. My pa was different.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我的话，是打自己。我爸就不一样了。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~A grass, to avoid doing time. That's why Gerry won't bend - he sees it as his penance for the sins of his brother.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~为了不坐牢而告密。所以Gerry才不会借酒借毒浇愁，他认为这是对哥哥罪孽的弥补。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~He went to Ireland to find it all. An old romantic he was.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~他去爱尔兰就是找这些的，老派的浪漫情调。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Keeps your head up your own fucking ass, that's about as grounded as you can get.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~能让你不至于屁股决定脑袋，要多明智有多明智。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~No... I'm sorry. Happy thoughts, puppies and little girls smiling and clowns and all that shit.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~没有...不好意思。想点高兴的吧，小狗、小妞的笑脸、小丑啥的。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Yes, but not long enough. I wish he'd been drowned at birth, got rid of the lot of us.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~挺久，但还不够久。我都希望他一出生就被淹死，省得我们痛苦。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~I can't go out and look for chicks without it, but once I'm out I'm in the can most of the night doing rails.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~没了它我不能出门，但只要我一出门，~n~差不多就是整晚操妞吸粉。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~What did Derrick want to find in Ireland?
~z~I remember one night, years ago, a bit after my dad died, he came home covered in blood.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我还记得几年前的一个晚上，在我爸死了一段时间后，他浑身是血的回到家。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~I'm not sure - but it didn't do him much good, either way. I think it was because of Derrick.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我不清楚，但实际上也没给他什么好处。我想是因为Derrick。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~I think that was when she realized just what we were like - she was young then. She was never quite the same after that.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我想她就是在那时候意识到我们的生活的，当时她还小。在那以后她就性情大变了。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Sure - I reckon it is - maybe that's why the world is divided into the drunk and the miserable?
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~当然，我想也是。所以世上才只有喝醉的和痛苦的两种人吧？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Sure... sure. Chaos we all know about. Gerry was the only one who ever tried to live beyond the chaos.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~当然...当然了。我们都知道这种混乱。Gerry是唯一一个尝试活在混乱之外的。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~This and that, you know? Trying to make ends meet.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~做这做那的，懂吧？挣钱养家呢。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~As long as I don't think about things, fantastic!
~z~I saw my brother get killed, a long time ago,
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~很久以前我亲眼看着我的兄弟被杀，

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~There is a lot that I am never going to understand, Packie. A whole fucking lot.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~有很多东西是我这辈子都搞不懂的，Packie。太他妈多了。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Sometimes, I think that is true for all of us.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~有时候我觉得这句话对所有人都适用。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Then he looks up and he sees Katie huddled up in the corner crying and shaking.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~然后他抬头看见Katie缩在角落里边哭边发抖。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~That might be a good idea, man.
~z~You still in contact with your family back in... wherever?
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~你还在和老家的亲戚联络吗？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~With what's left of them. I am not so lucky to have my whole family in one city.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~只和还活着的有联络。我可没好运到全家都在同一个城市。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~It ended when they was in the kitchen, Gerry was on top just smashing Frankie's head into the floor.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~打到厨房以后才结束的，Gerry都快要把Frankie的脑袋往地上敲了。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~I got to cut down on the shit.
~z~You're good people. I like it how you have stayed together.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~你们都是好人。我喜欢你们相处的方式。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~I don't know. He loved the stories about the Old Country. The poetry, the songs, the books.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~不知道。他就喜欢老家的那些故事。诗歌、歌曲、图书。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Although my dad was both - drunk and miserable. Right fucking idiot.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~不过我爸两种都占了，既醉又苦。真他妈白痴。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Us McRearys never flew far from the nest, we all stuck close to home.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~我们McReary家族从不远离自己的家，都待在离家近的地方。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Liberty City was never enough for him. He was always a dreamer.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~自由城对他远远不够。他一直都是个梦想家。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Ma didn't even flinch. She just sat there. The next week, Gerald's place at the table was empty.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~妈看了动都没动，就坐在那儿。后一周，Gerald在桌上的位置就没东西了。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Sure - great apart from all the blood and the guilt hey... kind of messed up, this kind of life isn't it?
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~当然，抛开那些血迹和罪行的话就挺好...是有点糟吧，这种生活？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~There was a look in their eyes. It was fucking animal.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~他们没有收手。眼里都有一种目光，是他妈野兽的目光。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~That's probably why he got into smack. Took him to another world.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~可能就是因此他才会沾上海洛因。能带他去另一个世界。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Be a hero with feet of clay or be a drunk and a thug and a killer,
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~做一个外强中干的英雄？还是醉醺醺的杀手混混？

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Maybe sometimes, I mainly try to focus my need to destroy things onto other people.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~也许有吧，我一般会把破坏欲发泄在别人身上。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~Francis tried to get me on his side, team up against the other two he said, but I wasn't having any of it.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~Francis也拉拢过我，想要抱团对抗他俩。不过我完全没接受。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~It's this fucking chop that's screwing me at the moment.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~现在我他妈被这些大麻烟搞得很心烦。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~All of us except for Francis. We stayed together when it was possible.
FCPC1AU.translated: ~z~除了Francis。还能在一起的时候我们倒在一起。

FCPC1AU.original: ~z~And then went into hiding, for years.
~z~Aren't we all, Niko. Aren't we all.
